Title: Establishes the statewide fibroid study program and statewide fibroid study program fund
Summary: Establishes the statewide fibroid study program to study fibroids, the treatment of fibroids, potential barriers to the access of treatment for fibroids, and differences in symptoms and access to treatment for women of color.
LawCode: Add ยง267-c, Pub Health L; add ยง87, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the statewide fibroid study program; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the statewide fibroid study program fund
